answers.answer: I am 22w and 3d and i go every week for weight checks but if i wasnt i would go every 4 weeks
After my appointment next month my Dr said I have to go every two weeks. I am almost 23 weeks.
Thank you ladies! My next appointment is on Wednesday (mar. 27)
On the 29th is my diabetes screen I'll be 26+3. Appts up to then have been monthly, after then it'll be every 2 week's
